title: Why did it take THREE presidential assassinations for the president to finally receive formal security? - Quora
tags: Presidents of the United States of America

response.answer_text: Becuase the President isn't supposed to be that important. Sure he's important. But not irreplaceable. Nor should she be. We should treat him like the Brits treat the Prime Minister. Live in an house not a mansion. Drive around with a few security guys, not a motorcade. It's not like we wont toss this lady out in 8 years anyway.
Not only did it take three presidential assassinations to finally formalize security, it took an additional 4 attempted assassinations.
